verbose_text: The p38 MAPK and ERK1/2 inhibitors (SB203580 and U0126) significantly decreased PLpro induced expression of TGF-beta1, vimentin, and type I collagen, which confirmed p38 MAPK and ERK1/2 modulating PLpro induced TGF-beta1 signaling cascades.
evidence: expression of TGF-beta1, vimentin, and type I collagen
